effect.scarlet_violet: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.the_teal_mask: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.
